events.name: 16U for You: The Open Mainframe for Industries
events.description: The literally open mainframe has arrived in the new IBM z14 ZR1 and IBM LinuxONE Rockhopper II. For the first time ever, you can now embed your own equipment within the main frame of the mainframe to craft your ideal solution. This meeting will discuss how to take advantage of this flexibility and will be of particular interest if you're looking for an extremely robust, all-in-one computing package for industry solutions such as a "bank in a box," integrated DevOps build/test services for all platforms (such as for a remote development team), "secure cloud outpost," trading exchange interface/execution system, or other "big idea" industry solution that you'd like to squeeze into a smaller, modern package. You may also join us via Webex below: https://ibm.webex.com/ibm/j.php?MTID=m06912e63a4da276dedcecbbe53221807Meeting number (access code):[masked]Meeting password: 16u11111
events.location: IBM ThinkPlace,  9 Changi Business Park Central 1,  The IBM Place, Singapore
events.group_name: IBM Z Technical Community in Asia Pacific

events.name: Generalized State Channels: making blockchains efficient
events.description: Counterfactual is a generalized, open framework for implementing state channels in an Ethereum-based decentralized application. The idea behind state channels is that we can make blockchains more efficient by moving many processes off-chain, while still retaining a blockchainâ€™s characteristic trustworthiness. About Counterfactual:We are building generalized state channels on Ethereum. We focus on researching and developing novel techniques for state channels that increase privacy; have support for parallel operations; provide verified, audited, and expertly optimised components; and that establish clear standards for how all of these generalised state channels will fit together into a global, multi-blockchain network where any user can easily connect to any other. We are focused on the long-term possibilities of the Ethereum project and blockchain technology. We will remain on the forefront of this field and actively support research and work done by others that build towards the decentralized future of the internet. We will actively reach out to and speak with projects in the Ethereum ecosystem and march relentlessly towards the best developer experience possible for our projects. Counterfactual is a non-profit research foundation funded by generous donations from individuals and companies, such as Vitalik Buterin and L4 Ventures. About the speaker:Xuanji Li is a researcher at Counterfactual, https://counterfactual.com/. For a previous presentation by Counterfactual, please see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kZH_ty82jKY
events.location: Paypal Innovation Lab, 5 Temasek Boulevard #07-01, Suntec Tower 5, Singapore, 038985

events.name: Blockchain Marketplaces | DAO PlayMarket 2.0 | Oil-T + AirDrop PMT
events.description: Many projects having completed their ICO can not realize their product, in most cases this is due to non-professional in the field. DAO PlayMarket 2.0 is a decentralized Android App Store that accepts payments in cryptocurrency and is combined with an ICO platform for developers. Oil-T Energy Groups an aggregation platform for real businesses involved in resource and energy projects. To date, Oil-T is planning to launch the ICO, you can find out more about the project at the link: https://oenergygroup.com For now, DAO PlayMarket 2.0 is being prepared to enter the exchange, beta version of product available: https://www.playmarket.io At the meetup, the problems of selling the ICO product will be announced, how to choose the right projects for the investment. And the solution of this problem will be offered by two projects. Speaker: Kirill KvanCEO DAO PlayMarket 2.0. Agenda:[masked]pm - Reception[masked]pm - Presentation and Q & A[masked]pm - Networking AirDrop:We will give 10PMT for every who will come to our conference!(PMT will be available on exchanges at the same day, 30 of April)

events.name: Signum Capital XSQ Hashed Lounge
events.description: Singapore meets Korea as XSQ combines with some of Asia's most prominent Blockchain Investment powers to showcase the innovative blockchain projects that is changing the social fabrics of society. Come for a night of deep conversations surrounding the blockchain technology and its subsequent use cases that these innovative companies are building. 10 Companies across asia, 3 Asia Crypto Powerhouses, 1 Night of blockchain. Space is highly limited and we only accept REGISTERED USERS and First come first served on attendees into the event venue. Join XSQ & Friends:https://t.me/xsqcommunity Presentation Schedule (Starting from 1915hrs onwards) TerraDo Kwon, Co-Founder 108 TokenAditya Mirsha, Co-founder & COO Rate 3Jake Goh, Co-founder & CEO CosmochainHowon Song, CEO ChyngeJoe Johari, CEO EximchainHope Liu, Co-founder & CEO Carry ProtocolRichard Choi, Cofounder & CEO SparrowExchangeReuben Conceicao, CSO Copyright ProtocolAlex Won, Co-founder & COO TracetoChionh Chye Kit, CEO Moderated By: Dr. Jin Li Lim, Head of Research QCP Capital
